description: This file is a build script for the 'rdklogger' component in a software project, specifically a shell script that automates configuration, cleaning, building, and installation processes for the component.

methods.name: configure
methods.description: Configures the build environment by running autoconf tools and the './configure' script with appropriate options.

methods.name: clean
methods.description: Cleans up build artifacts such as Makefiles and configuration files.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Executes the 'make' command to build the component.

methods.name: rebuild
methods.description: Cleans and then reconfigures and builds the component.

methods.name: install
methods.description: Installs the built component into the specified directory.

methods.name: usage
methods.description: Displays usage information for the script.
